"Gilnas Armor Plating":
"Don't you hate how cooking pots wear out so quickly?
They're just not built to last, you know?
What I really need is an armored cooking pot.
Something I could smash and bash countless times
without making a dent. Speaking of which, I've heard
of a really tough and durable automata called a Gilnas
down in the Underworks, so... Please bring me its
armor plating, would you?

*Target: Gilnases level 31 or higher"

"料理に使うお鍋って、結構すぐに
ダメになっちゃったりするのよねー。
素材の問題とは思うんだけど……
やっぱりここは、叩かれても何度でも
起き上がるような装甲を用いて
一つ素晴らしいのを作るべきかな、って。
ところで、地下坑道にギルナスっていう
すごいタフで頑丈な機甲種がいるって
聞いたんだけど……？
※Lv.31～のギルナスが対象"
